title: 我的世界光影包问题
author: jjw47856
txt_content:
如题，为什么我下载了整合包只要带有光影模组然后进入地图没画面就一闪一闪，把光影模组删了进入游戏就正常的，求大神帮我解释下


我的电脑配置：CPU英特尔 Core i5-480M (双核)主板海尔 ai7 G (Intel HM55 (IbexPeak-M DH))内存4 GBytes显卡英特尔 HD Graphics, 1465354 KBytes硬盘希捷 ST9320320AS

replies.author: 秦贤
replies.txt_content:
个人认为问题出在显卡上，光影MOD原始发布页上有标明不支持部分英特尔显卡

This mod requires recent and fast graphic card with NVIDIA or AMD GPU.
Intel HD Graphics drivers *.3408 to *.3621 do not work and will crash. 
Intel HD Graphics driver 15.33.29.64.3945+ can run without crash but it is still slow.

http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... updated-by-karyonix
